channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling B2B Integrator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling B2B Integrator

item.title: CVE-2020-4299|2024-09-16T19:41:14.881Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.0 through 6.0.3.1 could expose sensitive information to a user through a specially crafted HTTP request. IBM X-Force ID: 176606.

item.title: CVE-2018-1720|2024-09-16T16:42:31.465Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.1, 5.2.6.3_6, 6.0.0.0, and 6.0.0.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 147294.

item.title: CVE-2021-29758|2024-09-16T19:56:42.709Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow an authenticated user to perform actions that they should not be able to access due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 202169.

item.title: CVE-2021-20562|2024-09-16T16:48:16.529Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.0 through 5.2.6.5_3 and 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.0.2 vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 199232.

item.title: CVE-2018-1718|2024-09-16T17:57:56.491Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.1 - 5.2.6.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 147166.

item.title: CVE-2019-4146|2024-09-16T20:12:37.015Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 and 6.0.0.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive document information under unusual circumstances. IBM X-Force ID: 158401.

item.title: CVE-2021-39035|2024-09-16T18:38:26.744Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.5, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.0.4, and 6.1.1.0 through 6.1.1.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 213965.

item.title: CVE-2017-1481|2024-09-16T20:42:49.961Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2 allows a user to view sensitive information that belongs to another user. IBM X-Force ID: 128619.

item.title: CVE-2021-29836|2024-09-16T19:04:52.712Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.0. through 6.1.1.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 204912.

item.title: CVE-2019-4680|2024-09-16T19:19:19.364Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.0 through 6.0.2.2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 171733.

item.title: CVE-2020-4312|2024-09-16T20:13:13.360Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.0 trough 6.0.3.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from a cached web page. IBM X-Force ID: 177089.

item.title: CVE-2018-1513|2024-09-16T20:31:53.860Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0 through 5.2.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 141551.

item.title: CVE-2019-4073|2024-09-16T20:21:43.071Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 and 6.0.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 157107.

item.title: CVE-2020-4705|2024-09-16T17:08:24.700Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.2 and 5.2.0.0 through 5.2.6.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 187190.

item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator 5.2.0.1 through 6.0.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. IBM X-force ID: 155907.

item.title: CVE-2021-29764|2024-09-16T16:24:05.784Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator 5.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 202268.

item.title: CVE-2019-4597|2024-09-16T16:13:12.009Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.0 through 5.2.6.5 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 167880.

item.title: CVE-2018-1679|2024-09-16T16:22:58.882Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2 through 5.2.6 could allow an unauthenticated user to obtain sensitive information that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 145180.

item.title: CVE-2020-4564|2024-09-16T16:38:35.227Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.0 through 6.0.3.1 and IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.0.3.1 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 183933.

item.title: CVE-2019-4077|2024-09-16T20:06:16.632Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 and 6.0.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 157111.

item.title: CVE-2017-1174|2024-09-16T20:42:40.586Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 123296.

item.title: CVE-2019-4076|2024-09-16T20:58:20.544Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 and 6.0.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 157110.

item.title: CVE-2020-4692|2024-09-16T18:49:38.735Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.2 and 5.2.0.0 through 5.2.6.5 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from the Dashboard UI. IBM X-Force ID: 186780.

item.title: CVE-2019-4043|2024-09-16T16:32:40.540Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0 snf 6.0.0.0 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 156239.

item.title: CVE-2019-4222|2024-09-16T16:38:20.202Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 and 6.0.0.1 could allow an authenticated user to view process definition of a business process without permission. IBM X-Force ID: 159231.

item.title: CVE-2018-1800|2024-09-16T17:48:58.826Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.6.0 and 6.2.6.1 could allow a local user to obtain highly sensitive information during a short time period when installation is occurring. IBM X-Force ID: 149607.

item.title: CVE-2019-4148|2024-09-16T19:40:18.193Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 and 6.0.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 158414.

item.title: CVE-2019-4726|2024-09-16T20:26:43.136Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0.0 through 5.2.6.5 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 172363.

item.title: CVE-2020-4655|2024-09-16T20:02:31.368Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.2 and 5.2.0.0 through 5.2.6.5 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 186091.

item.title: CVE-2019-4027|2024-09-16T20:31:25.043Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator 5.2.0.1 through 6.0.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-ForceID: 155905.

item.title: CVE-2022-22482|2024-09-16T19:46:55.549Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.5 and 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that could fill up the filesystem and cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 225977.

item.title: CVE-2020-4700|2024-09-16T18:29:13.906Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.2 and 5.2.0.0 through 5.2.6.5 could allow an authenticated user belonging to a specific user group to create a user or group with administrative privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 187077.

item.title: CVE-2024-22357|2024-08-01T22:43:34.557Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 280894.
